items.sentence: We thought that we'd only be able to sell a few tickets, but we've already sold them all.
I always seem to be sleepy during the day, but I never seem to be able to sleep at night.
Tom and I both wanted to go to Australia, but the boss said that only one of us could go.
Tom told Mary that he was going to Boston, but he told John that he was going to Chicago.
Yanni decided to break up with Skura and surprisingly, she didn't put up much of a fight.
